headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: asset_ids
parameters.description: List of asset IDs that you want to delete. Currently, only one ID is allowed. library_id when asset_type is LEAD , and ID of a TikTok account in a Business Center when asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Type of asset you want to delete. Enum values: LEAD , TT_ACCOUNT (corresponds to BC_AUTH_TT , and learn more from Identities ). Note When the asset_type is LEAD , you can only delete a single lead at a time. Once deleted, the lead will be moved back to the ad account that it was placed previously.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
